newsitem.title: UK: Polish Stalexport roadshow to start end Q1 - Fleming.
newsitem.headline: Polish Stalexport roadshow to start end Q1 - Fleming.

text.p: Roadshows for the $50 million convertible bond issue from Polish steelmaker Stalexport SA will start at the end of the first quarter of 1997, lead manager Robert Fleming said.
"The issue will have a maturity of five- to seven years and will be listed in London," said a spokesman for the lead manager.
He added that Stalexport, Poland's largest steelmaker, was raising the cash because it wanted to become a fully integrated steelmaker.
The issue was keenly fought over among lead managers and Flemings, which said it is the largest manager of convertible bond issues out of Asia, won over stiff competition.
"We are making a determined push in Eastern Europe," said the Flemings spokesman. -- David Chance London newsroom 44 171 542 5887
